* Any software that installs and requires a [[device driver]] to function. Applications that use pre-installed device drivers can function without issues.<ref>[http://www.thinstall.com/sales/demo.php Thinstall product demos] (the first one)</ref>
* Any software that installs and requires a [[device driver]] to function. Applications that use pre-installed device drivers can function without issues.<ref>[http://www.thinstall.com/sales/demo.php Thinstall product demos] (the first one)</ref>
* Some software with [[copy protection]] based on [[hardware]]. ThinApp will virtualize some hardware properties such as harddrive serial numbers but applications that bind to things like ethernet MAC address or CPU-ID may not run when moved to another PC.
* Some software with [[copy protection]] based on [[hardware]]. ThinApp will virtualize some hardware properties such as harddrive serial numbers but applications that bind to things like ethernet MAC address or CPU-ID may not run when moved to another PC.

==Future development==
  â
A new version of VMware ThinApp is expected in the first quarter of 2010, with new features like support for [[Windows 7]] and the ability to open thinApp package files.<ref name="virtualfuture1">{{cite web|url=http://virtualfuture.info/2009/09/vmworld-2009-thinapp-upcoming-features/ |title=VMworld 2009: ThinApp upcoming features |publisher=Virtualfuture.info |date=2009-09-02 |accessdate=2009-10-22}}</ref> A Beta version is expected in November/2009.<ref name="virtualfuture1"/> Version 4.0.4 already has support for Windows 7.
